AI Description: Intel MPI (Message Passing Interface) is a high-performance MPI library implementation specifically designed for Intel architecture-based clusters. It enables parallel performance for high-performance computing (HPC) applications, allowing for efficient communication among distributed processes.
Core Features: High-Performance Message Passing Interface (Mpi) Library, Optimized For Intel Architecture-Based Clusters, Facilitates Efficient Communication Among Distributed Processes, Supports Parallel Performance For Hpc Applications
General Tags: Mpi Library, High-Performance Computing, Parallel Computing, Cluster Computing
